org.codehaus.mojo.sonar.bootstrap

Class RunnerBootstraper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.mojo.sonar.bootstrap.RunnerBootstraper

  • public class RunnerBootstraper
extends Object
    Configure properties and bootstrap using SonarQube runner API (need SQ 4.3+)
